replies.body:
Ocean drake isn't an adjustment, it is a flat out nerf, especially for anyone in a lane (it'd be a slight nerf for junglers even because the numbers are tuned down, even though they always have it active inside the jungle)

Also, in what realm are the Nocturne/Shyvana changes not a buff?

It means they can run Guinsoo's if they want and not waste the AP ratio.

Also find it funny that Earth drake is in nerfs, considering that if all of the above is in adjustment, then the earth dragon change is an adjustment (increasing true damage was more or less a screw up in the coding by riot.)
